channel.title: [show] "Reaper's Blade Of Pain" [show] (named by dimrain)
channel.description:
Okay i thought i'd make a topic for this since i finially got it working ingame. i got the sword from naruto, it's called the exuctioner's sword or something (zabuza has it) and i thought omg i'm totally making 1 of those. for those who have seen my other topic in models "showoff spongebob characters showoff" the pics of it are in there. but here are some ingames pics aswell as the metaseq thing. when i finially got it working ingame, i decided to make it epic/awesome/amazing by uping the size of it alittle xD see below to know what im talking about. i gave it dh greataxe anims because i wanted to go over his shoulder, i planned on it having that while i was making it aswell.
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2zrpybp.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2rdixxj.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2e5p7ya.jpg[/img]
INGAME:
[IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/35mma29.gif[/img]
credits: 99% me for making 1% to silentcj, although he did nothing, his tut on modeling has gotten me this far thanks to his awesome moparscape model's tut so yeah ty for metaseq, .datamaker and the awesome guide without it i wouldn't of been able to make it and what i can make today.
also, i'll post some pics of my halloween spongebob i intend on using for my halloween event, need to fix up a few things 1st tho.

I think the handle is just too long!! other than that it looks awesome!!

_

Over-sized weapons is pretty common on RPG games

I think Final Fantasy is the original

this game is ran online - its gay lol - look at them they r wearing sports bra
but i like the over-sized kitchen blade (yes the name of the weapon is Kitchen Blade)

the best way to hold 2h swords should be like this – looks badass imo

or maybe this one … jk

but i did find a sword that pretty much has the same size as urs lol

item.title: [show] "Reaper's Blade Of Pain" [show] (named by dimrain)
item.dc:creator: @1pk4l1f3 1pk4l1f3
item.description:
@1pk4l1f3 wrote:

[quote=“SolarKnight, post:32, topic:348057”]The anime sword is no where near that size. As you can see when Suigetsu holds it in shippuuden. He’s smaller than zabuza too.

It’s about body size, also make the handle WAAAAYYYYYYYY SHORTER. The handle is about 2 hands big. So you can barerly get two and have a couple inches.

Other than that, it’s cool.[/quote]

actually thanks for that, thats the pic i needed. IF YOU ACTUALLY WATCH an episode where he is in it, he atatches another part of the hilt to it therefore making it longer.

as you can see here, the hilt is much longer than that as it is the size of his arm (ok i see mine’s a tad big) but its a lot bigger than you think it is.

also at different angles which i used the blade looks alot bigger, such as in this pic of it from manga:

Read full topic

item.title: [show] "Reaper's Blade Of Pain" [show] (named by dimrain)
item.dc:creator: @SolarKnight SolarKnight
item.description:
@SolarKnight wrote:

The anime sword is no where near that size. As you can see when Suigetsu holds it in shippuuden. He’s smaller than zabuza too.

It’s about body size, also make the handle WAAAAYYYYYYYY SHORTER. The handle is about 2 hands big. So you can barerly get two and have a couple inches.

Other than that, it’s cool.

Read full topic

item.title: [show] "Reaper's Blade Of Pain" [show] (named by dimrain)
item.dc:creator: @1pk4l1f3 1pk4l1f3
item.description:
@1pk4l1f3 wrote:

its actually more of a show off weapon atm lolz. looks kool to hold people are just like wtF? where can i get one? so yeah its fun to walk around with lolz. more of a show off weapon. looks kool so yeah lolz. ummmm dunno really what else to say other then, it wasnt ment to be this size xD but i recon it looked kool like it is so i left it. other then that thanks to those who like to, those who dont… well… i feel sorry for your illness. ill be posting some more models of other stuff i’ve made and things i will make later. thanks for taking the time to look at my topic.

Read full topic

item.title: [show] "Reaper's Blade Of Pain" [show] (named by dimrain)
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:26, topic:348057”][quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=444438.msg3267588#msg3267588 date=1278971913]
Fits into runescape stylistically; resize it A LOT. OK, I get that Anime includes many (way) oversized weapons but this doesn’t mean that you need to keep them oversized when you add them to a server. Quite honestly, it looks stupid. Why would someone try swinging a sword around which weighs more than he/she himself does? Do you understand what I’m saying?
[/quote]Like that thing from Bleach I made awhile ago?[/quote]
No idea; I don’t keep much memory for models which I wasn’t fond of… So unless it wow’ed me I probably wont remember… Honestly, I’ve forgotten most of the models that I’ve made for RSPS… I guess after awhile my mind ‘overwrites’ previous memory of models I don’t think I can name even 12 of the many models I’ve made.

Read full topic
